subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|艸|alt1=艹|化|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=grass; plant}}. Originally {{zh-l|*𠌶}} or {{zh-l|*華}} before the {{w|Han dynasty}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Unknown. According to {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}}, either from:
* {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*bar}} and thus an example of possible *'''b'''~*'''w''' variation, with final ''-r'' moved to medial position. If so, cognate with {{och-l|葩}}; outside {{w|Sinitic languages|Sinitic}}, compare {{cog|my|ပန်း}}, {{cog|lep|tr=búr}}, {{cog|lus|páar}}.
* Or from {{der|zh|aav}}; compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*pkaaw ~ *pkaʔ||flower, blossom}}.
